DescribeEntitiesDetectionV2Job.name: DescribeEntitiesDetectionV2Job
DescribeEntitiesDetectionV2Job.description:
Grants permission to describe the properties of a medical entity detection job that
                                                you have submitted

DescribeICD10CMInferenceJob.name: DescribeICD10CMInferenceJob
DescribeICD10CMInferenceJob.description:
Grants permission to describe the properties of an ICD-10-CM linking job that you
                                                have submitted

DescribePHIDetectionJob.name: DescribePHIDetectionJob
DescribePHIDetectionJob.description:
Grants permission to describe the properties of a PHI entity detection job that you
                                                have submitted

DescribeRxNormInferenceJob.name: DescribeRxNormInferenceJob
DescribeRxNormInferenceJob.description:
Grants permission to describe the properties of an RxNorm linking job that you have
                                                submitted

DetectEntitiesV2.name: DetectEntitiesV2
DetectEntitiesV2.description:
Grants permission to detect the named medical entities, and their relationships and
                                                traits within the given text document

DetectPHI.name: DetectPHI
DetectPHI.description:
Grants permission to detect the protected health information (PHI) entities within
                                                the given text document

InferICD10CM.name: InferICD10CM
InferICD10CM.description:
Grants permission to detect the medical condition entities within the given text document
                                                and link them to ICD-10-CM codes

InferRxNorm.name: InferRxNorm
InferRxNorm.description:
Grants permission to detect the medication entities within the given text document
                                                and link them to RxCUI concept identifiers from the National Library of Medicine RxNorm
                                                database

ListEntitiesDetectionV2Jobs.name: ListEntitiesDetectionV2Jobs
ListEntitiesDetectionV2Jobs.description: Grants permission to list the medical entity detection jobs that you have submitted

ListICD10CMInferenceJobs.name: ListICD10CMInferenceJobs
ListICD10CMInferenceJobs.description: Grants permission to list the ICD-10-CM linking jobs that you have submitted

ListPHIDetectionJobs.name: ListPHIDetectionJobs
ListPHIDetectionJobs.description: Grants permission to list the PHI entity detection jobs that you have submitted

ListRxNormInferenceJobs.name: ListRxNormInferenceJobs
ListRxNormInferenceJobs.description: Grants permission to list the RxNorm linking jobs that you have submitted

StartEntitiesDetectionV2Job.name: StartEntitiesDetectionV2Job
StartEntitiesDetectionV2Job.description:
Grants permission to start an asynchronous medical entity detection job for a collection
                                                of documents

StartICD10CMInferenceJob.name: StartICD10CMInferenceJob
StartICD10CMInferenceJob.description:
Grants permission to start an asynchronous ICD-10-CM linking job for a collection
                                                of documents

StartPHIDetectionJob.name: StartPHIDetectionJob
StartPHIDetectionJob.description:
Grants permission to start an asynchronous PHI entity detection job for a collection
                                                of documents

StartRxNormInferenceJob.name: StartRxNormInferenceJob
StartRxNormInferenceJob.description:
Grants permission to start an asynchronous RxNorm linking job for a collection of
                                                documents

StopEntitiesDetectionV2Job.name: StopEntitiesDetectionV2Job
StopEntitiesDetectionV2Job.description: Grants permission to stop a medical entity detection job

StopICD10CMInferenceJob.name: StopICD10CMInferenceJob
StopICD10CMInferenceJob.description: Grants permission to stop an ICD-10-CM linking job

StopPHIDetectionJob.name: StopPHIDetectionJob
StopPHIDetectionJob.description: Grants permission to stop a PHI entity detection job

StopRxNormInferenceJob.name: StopRxNormInferenceJob
StopRxNormInferenceJob.description: Grants permission to stop an RxNorm linking job
